Name: Toni (David) Lowry
Description:
Toni was stabbed multiple times in the chest, allegedly by David E. Neal aka Micky Alphonso Accardo.

> PITTSBURGH (UPI) - A man who dressed as a character from the Broadway musical "Cats" was sentenced Thursday to 9-to-20 years in prison for killing a downtown [trans sex worker] last fall. David Neal was convicted of
third-degree murder last March in the Oct. 20 stabbing death of [deadname] Lowery, 28.
>
> Lowery also was known as "Toni." Neal maintained he stabbed Lowery in self-defense. But an autopsy showed Lowery suffered several "defensive wounds," a pathologist said.
